venue.name: Boston Pizza
venue.description: ****Restaurant hours may differ from what is listed. Please call for the most up to date hours.**** Boston Pizza is Canada’s No. 1 casual dining brand serving delicious menu items such as gourmet pizzas and pastas, juicy burgers and our famous BP wings available for delivery or take out. Boston P...

pageInfo.description: Started in Edmonton, Alberta in 1964, Boston Pizza is 'two experiences under one roof' – a family-friendly casual dining restaurant with a separate sports bar.

items.text: Boston Royale pizza is the bomb
Food portion is huge, but taste so so, maybe because I ordered the wrong food (spaghetti with Creamy sauce)
Great beer and atmosphere in the tasting room. Come fill up a growler

formattedAddress: 9000 Valley Drive (at Sea to Sky Hwy)

items.text: Everything is awesome!
Food is fantastic! Something for everyone!

venue.name: Crazy Raven Bar & Grill

location.crossStreet: in Cypress Creek Lodge at Cypress Mountain
formattedAddress: 8500 Cypress Bowl Rd W (in Cypress Creek Lodge at Cypress Mountain)

venue.description: After your day of skiing or riding on Vancouver's ONLY Big Mountain Experience stop in to our new centrally located Crazy Raven Bar and Grill and try Granville Islands Crazy Raven Pale Ale!

items.text: Nice after a Snowboard section a fresh beer !!
Give their pizzas a try. They are thin crust and one of the best I've tried
Half price wings during Canucks games!
Everything is homemade. Shady burger is tastey.
Pizza is super good!
Best beer in squamish, and a great staff.

items.name: Beautiful British Columbia
items.description: Places to see, things to do, food to eat, etc. all in British Columbia.

items.text: Fat Tug is on tap..weird crowd..waitress didnt know the menu..
I think this is the only place in Squamish that has KARAOKE!
Chilling with the friends

venue.name: the Wolf & Drum Brewery and Alehouse

items.text: Thai Chicken Soup @ café, Great cold drinks at the store, great paintings at the gallery and of course an amazing view!
They make great cider.
Great cider!
This is a lake, which gets very busy when it is warm out.

venue.name: Howe Sound Inn and Brewing Company

items.summary: Lots of people like this place

items.text: Such great craft beer, and the sustainability of their operation keeps us coming back. Bacon wrapped meatloaf and lamb shepard's pie? Delicious...
If your lucky enough to be here in the fall try their Pumpkin Ale, it is the best.

items.name: Top 10 Squamish Canada
items.description: No particular order, just stuff I know to be good.

items.text: Craft cocktails using local ingredients
